Name: SOK PRO
About the game: SOK PRO - sokoban classic puzzle game. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off. Completely redesigned from scratch, recreated on a new engine and with new functions. Features: ✔️ Undo of a move in case of error; ✔️ Personal statistics & Steam Leaderboards; ✔️ Switch between full screen and windowed mode; ✔️ Offline mode; ✔️ Convenient and quick selection of the required level; ✔️ Ability to change the language and other settings; ✔️ Screenshots are working correctly; ✔️ New background music (can be turned off); ✔️ Selectable background color: ▪ Dark theme; ▪ Classic, light theme; ▪ Gold, Lime and Diamond backgrounds. And also: ■ 100 different levels, from easy to hard; ■ 100 beautiful achievements; ■ Cloud saves; ■ Community Hub Walkthrough Guides.
